description.short: OSC message sender which sends to a specific host & port

methods.name: appendBundle
methods.parameters: const ofxOscBundle &bundle, int &p

methods.name: appendMessage
methods.parameters: const ofxOscMessage &message, int &p

methods.name: appendParameter
methods.parameters: ofxOscBundle &bundle, const ofAbstractParameter &parameter, const string &address

methods.name: appendParameter
methods.parameters: ofxOscMessage &msg, const ofAbstractParameter &parameter, const string &address

methods.name: clear
methods.short: clear the sender, does not clear host or port values

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.parameters: const ofxOscMessage &message, bool wrapInBundle=true
methods.short: send the given message if wrapInBundle is true (default), message sent in a timetagged bundle

methods.name: sendParameter
methods.short: create & send a message with data from an ofParameter

methods.name: setup
methods.parameters: const string &host, int port
methods.short: set up the sender with the destination host name/ip and port \return true on success

methods.name: setup
methods.short:
set up the sender with the given settings

Returns: true on success
